sentences.english: Objective. The purposes of our work are to establish new methods of species identification in forensic entomology.
sentences.chinese: 目的本课题旨在探索新的法医昆虫学种属鉴定方法。

sentences.english: Forensic science is a growth industry.
sentences.chinese: 法医学是一个发展中的产业。

sentences.english: Forensic experts carried out a painstaking search of the debris.

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the scientific method for evaluating the quality of medicolegal appraisement.

sentences.english: The dignified and beautiful female legal medical expert smoothly says the corpse checks a result.

sentences.english: Without corroboration from forensic tests it will be difficult to prove that the suspect is guilty.
sentences.chinese: 没有法医化验的确证就很难证明嫌疑犯有罪。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the forensic identification and significance of amniotic fluid embolism (AFE).
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨羊水栓塞致死的法医学鉴定和意义。

sentences.english: The British team will assist with the forensic investigation.

sentences.english: The purpose of our study is to develop a new approach of identification species for forensic ichthyology.
sentences.chinese: 本课题旨在研究用于法医鱼类学种属鉴别的新技术。

sentences.english: He went through the same crude forensic self examination as Crowley.
sentences.chinese: 像克鲁利一样对自己进行了一翻简单的法医鉴定。

The method and the result are significant for improving the efficiency and accuracy of the forensic medicine identification.

sentences.english: The transitional period of Chinese forensic medicine is in Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 唐朝对法医学来说，是一个承前启后的时代。
